channel.title: Afro Scape V1 Repost
channel.description:
Afro-Scape V1 « on: March 07, 2009, 11:10:05 pm » Quote Modify Remove
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ok well not really much Help last time sorry if its rong but i really need to know what to do to make server
better so i can release to players making new servers to give them an easyer and more fun server
New Home
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/9512/15956297b7552fem3.jpg[/img][/URL]
New Monkey Wars
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/1407/15956297b7552fem3i.jpg[/img][/URL]
New Shops
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/9512/15956297b7552fem3.jpg[/img][/URL]
New Skilling Area
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/2308/15956297b7552fem3b.jpg[/img][/URL]
New Training Area
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/5452/15956297b7552fem3t.jpg[/img][/URL]
New Mining
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/4484/15956297b7552fem3c.jpg[/img][/URL]
Same Old Barrows (* thinking about changing in v2 *) =)
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/7454/15956297b7552fem3k.jpg[/img][/URL]
Same Slayer ( same with barrows ) 0.o
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/9512/15956297b7552fem3.jpg[/img][/URL]
Havn't changed farming YET =)
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/7295/15956297b7552fem3a.jpg[/img][/URL]
New Desert Wild lots of fun to be had here =)
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/7822/15956297b7552fem3j.jpg[/img][/URL]
Made old train new pkbox goign to cahnge later to pk island instead of box =) will be fun
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/9512/15956297b7552fem3.jpg[/img][/URL]
This is Inside Sara Sword mini game *beware theres more than just those 3 i killed most of them =)* ALOT MORE
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/9512/15956297b7552fem3.jpg[/img][/URL]
Summoning * The Hell Hound is following me just look in the Client.java files for The summoning items you drop Should be close to bottom not item.java i seriously mean client.java*
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/4295/15956297b7552fem3h.jpg[/img][/URL]
Poratl Room (old home)
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img91.imageshack.us/img91/9512/15956297b7552fem3.jpg[/img][/URL]
New Staff Zone
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img91.imageshack.us/img91/764/15956297b7552fem3p.jpg[/img][/URL]
Lol a bar i put in For People to get wasted and have wild beer fights
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/764/15956297b7552fem3p.jpg[/img][/URL]
ME IN FULL VOID AND SARA SWORD WATCHING SOME PEOPLE FIGHT
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/7052/15956297b7552fem3e.jpg[/img][/URL]
Dragon Fire Shield Fire Ball =)
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/9512/15956297b7552fem3.jpg[/img][/URL]
Working Jail for mods + (so you dont have to worry about those anoying players that always ask for mod or admin =)
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/1783/15958566841a020m3h.png[/img][/URL]
Some few commands
Owners
::void ::pets ::runes ::beer ::dp ::noclip ::jail
ok thats the end i thank you for reading this since you have had to if your reading this right now 0.o
Please feel free to say anything about this you want just don't spam =) but i do want the truth
I take it as constructive criticism
should i have realesed this or not.
Mega Share download link
http://www.MegaShare.com/631777
ALSO LOTS OF NEW CHANGES IN V2 IF THERE SHALL BE ON
IT DEPENDS ON YOUR THOUGHTS OF V! =)
CREDITS TO
Afro X (scoobygod) aka- me =)
Mod Allstar - and who ever helped him :confused:
you start sara sword/ void mini game in pkbox ill be changing to probly a tele tab on the mage book=)

item.description:

well ty for helping im pretty sure i know the place i wont say it ;D but ima see if theres another place but i might use it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2009, 06:58:34 pm[/size][hr]so people who are downloading if you are :rolleyes: are you liking it ?

item.title: Afro Scape V1 Repost
item.dc:creator: @Redfield Redfield
item.description:
@Redfield wrote:

Well, i can send you a picture of where I put MY shops. Were the coords are, I cannot tell.

I coded them %100. Do what I did.

item.dc:creator: @scoobygod scoobygod
item.description:
@scoobygod wrote:

ok thanks im already working on that for v2 i already have put in anti syi and nuller thanks to tuts and help from dr4c0 also trying to find a good place to put clan wars and shops

item.title: Afro Scape V1 Repost
item.dc:creator: @Redfield Redfield
item.description:
@Redfield wrote:

Well, all you need to improve, like I said, is the home area. Other than that, it’s good.

@Redfield wrote:

HAHA, some guy just repped me to 18 rep and now im going to TRY to find how to rep you.

item.title: Afro Scape V1 Repost
item.dc:creator: @Redfield Redfield
item.description:
@Redfield wrote:

Very nice. Some advice though, you might want to change the home area, because it’s too small. I Use to have that one for my server. All you can fit is maybe 1 or 2 portals, a few npc’s and a Bank booth. Overall it’s VERY good I would Rep++.

Read full topic

would rep+

Ok well not really much Help last time sorry if its rong but i really need to know what to do to make server
